description: Shohreh Bayat, 32, has caused controversy after appearing in photographs without a headscarf.
title: Iran chess ref Shohreh Bayat fears returning home over hijab row
title_page: Iran chess ref Shohreh Bayat fears returning home over hijab row - BBC News
maintext: "It's against my beliefs. People should have the right to choose the way they want to dress, it should not be forced," she explained, speaking from Vladivostok in eastern Russia, where she is now refereeing the second leg of the World Championship.
